meanings.definition: (ラテン語)まき散らす、まく、植える、結びつける、始める、参加させる、加わる
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to sow, plant, join, connect, begin, engage in, participate in

etymology.value: ラテン語の「com-」（共に）+「serere」（まく、植える）から構成される。

verb_forms.present_indicative: conserō, conseris, conserit, conserimus, conseritis, conserunt
verb_forms.imperfect_indicative: conserēbam, conserēbās, conserēbat, conserēbāmus, conserēbātis, conserēbant
verb_forms.future_indicative: conseram, conserēs, conseret, conserēmus, conserētis, conserent
verb_forms.perfect_indicative: consēvī, consēvistī, consēvit, consēvimus, consēvistis, consēvērunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_indicative: consēveram, consēverās, consēverat, consēverāmus, consēverātis, consēverant
verb_forms.future_perfect_indicative: consēverō, consēveris, consēverit, consēverimus, consēveritis, consēverint
verb_forms.present_subjunctive: conseram, conserās, conserat, conserāmus, conserātis, conserant
verb_forms.imperfect_subjunctive: consererem, consererēs, consereret, consererēmus, consererētis, consererent
verb_forms.perfect_subjunctive: consēverim, consēveris, consēverit, consēverimus, consēveritis, consēverint
verb_forms.pluperfect_subjunctive: consēvissem, consēvissēs, consēvisset, consēvissēmus, consēvissētis, consēvissent

usage_notes.explanation: 「conserere」はラテン語の動詞であり、様々な意味を持ちます。物理的な行為（まく、植える）から、抽象的な行為（結びつける、始める）まで、幅広い文脈で使用されます。

derivatives: consitus (形容詞: まかれた、植えられた)
consitio (名詞: まくこと、植えること)

example_sentences.translation: 兵士たちは戦闘を始めた。
